snippet: Binge-viewing, empowered by DVD box sets and Netflix subscriptions, has become such a popular way for Americans to watch TV that it is beginning to influence the ways the stories are told and how they are distributed, reports Brian Stelter in...
abstract: Binge-viewing, empowered by DVD box sets and Netflix subscriptions, has become such a popular way for Americans to watch TV that it is beginning to influence the ways the stories are told and how they are distributed, reports Brian Stelter in Friday's New York Times.

headline.main: Daily Report: A New Way to Deliver a TV Drama
